评论详情: Loved the color. It’s not bright orange - just perfect yellow orange that complemented by tan skin tone. The dress wears well. It’s “thinner” fabric but not see through. I wore it for a luau in HI and received many compliments!

Love this dress! Got lots of compliments

I bought this dress for my baby shower. I had to size up to XL as I am in my third trimester with a very big belly. Since this is not a maternity dress, I think certain parts of the dress were a little too big (chest area) where others were pretty tight (belly.) May have worked better in the second trimester or on someone who is not pregnant. Overall, the dress is good quality and fun pattern. Also, the dress came very wrinkled, so I would be prepared to steam it before wearing.
The dress is made well with really nice material. The print is to bright for my liking.  I wasn’t happy with the fit as the top was floppy if that makes sense.
I bought size small .I’m 4”11  117 pounds 36 C  and was perfect. No need high heels. The pattern is bright and beautiful . The fabric is is soft and fresh .

Worked well for large bust as you can tie it as loose or tight as needed. 5’5” and somewhere around 185-190lbs (27 weeks pregnant) and the large worked well. Also tried the extra large and it also fit well but didn’t feel the need for the extra length in the bottom or on the arms so went with the large!
Dress was flattering. Only complaint is that the material was a bit hot and didn’t breathe. Not ideal for summer but I mostly wore indoors. Looks as lovely as photos.

Disappointed that this dress wasn’t a win. The material is VERY thin and definitely does not feel nice enough for that price tag. It is also super low cut with a very bulky tie in the front. The print is so fun, but unfortunately the quality/construction is very poor.

类型: Color: Big Floral White BlueSize: Medium
评论详情: I recently bought this dress and it has quickly become one of my favorite pieces. The floral design is beautiful and perfect for summer. The dress is incredibly versatile, making it suitable for so many occasions, from casual outings to more dressed-up events. The deep V-neck and tie front add a stylish touch, and the cutout detail is just right, adding an element of chic without being too revealing. I always feel confident especially after just having a baby and get so many compliments when I wear it. Highly recommend this amazing dress!
You can wear this dress anywhere.  The colors are Very cute and flattering. Summer vibes

This dress is the perfect blend of comfort and cute. The deep v neckline and tie at the bust is sexy, but can easily be adjusted to be more appropriate in a casual setting. The dress is light, comfortable and very cute. It’s thin, doesn’t wrinkle and is lined so that it isn’t see through. There is definitely no stretch to the material, although it has an elastic waistline and the tie is functional so you can adjust that as well. I got the royal blue with the small black and white daisies and I absolutely love it! I’m 5’5” a size 6/8 and the medium fits perfectly.
Fits too tight in chest, not good. Wanted to return, would not allow.

Overall it’s super cute :) wish the tummy area was a little looser but that’s on me :p maybe one day it will be! Covers the arms and is a good length. Love it!

You can custom fit the bust area due to how the dress ties in that spot. 100% recommend.

评论概述: Got so many compliments on this dress.
评论详情: I have trouble finding dresses I like because I’m picky, I like to cover my arms and I don’t like anything tight fitting. I loved this dress. I got so many compliments. I’m about 205lbs and I got and XL. I didn’t realize before ordering it that there’s a little open spot below the bow so I got a tank top to go underneath. I did have to iron it which was kind of a pain because obviously it’s a dress but it says to iron on low heat and low heat did nothing so I bumped it up to low/medium and had no issues. I washed it and let it air dry and it looks like that would have also been a solution to getting the wrinkles out. Overall no complaints.
This dress is great quality and the colors are beautiful. I love it.
